title: Thunderbird profile "lost" after ZoneAlarm Uninstall and subsequent Windows Restart.
content: Got the following message upon trying to run Thunderbird after a ZoneAlarm Uninstall and subsequent Windows Restart: " .. Thunderbird profile cannot be loaded. It may be missing or inaccessible." Any ideas what happened, and is it recoverable? (There is a "... .default" folder in Thunderbird's "Profiles" folder.)
creator: middet

title: how to export Thunderbird emails to MBOX
content:
I am currently using Thunderbird 115.3.1 (64-bit). The about info shows that I can update to 115.10.1, however, I believe there are much later versions but I don't know if I can update to the latest. My MacOS is 10.15.7 and that is the latest I can install.

I have a large amount of email stored on my MAC and not in the cloud.

I want to be able to access these emails that are on my hard drive, in addition to Thunderbird, in Apple Mail.

I have researched and it appears that the best way is to export from Thunderbird is into the mbox format. However, there does not seem to be a way to do this in the version of Thunderbird I am using.

How do I move all of my local email in Thunderbird to my Apple Mail?

Thanks for any help, Richard
creator: Richard403

title: mailadressen bijvoegen in android
content:
Beste , ik gebruik Thunderbird al jaren, en heb het nu ook op mijn android toestel. Ik heb alles van op mijn pc naar mijn android toestel gezet. Ik kan mails versturen, en ontvangen, maar voor het verzenden ontbreek ik mijn mailadressen. Ik heb nu wel "Verzamelde adressen.csv" en "Persoonlijk adresboek" op mijn toestel staan, maar kan die niet inlezen, de map adresboek vind ik ook niet. Kan iemand mij a.u.b. uitleg geven , hoe ik dit kan oplossen.

met vriendelijke groet, Walter wcochuyt@skynet.be

Cher , J'utilise Thunderbird depuis des années et je l'ai également installé sur mon appareil Android. J'ai tout transféré de mon PC à mon appareil Android. Je peux envoyer et recevoir des mails, mais pour l'envoi, il me manque mes adresses mail. J'ai maintenant "Adresses collectées.csv" et "Carnet d'adresses personnel" sur mon appareil, mais je ne peux pas les lire, je ne trouve pas non plus le dossier du carnet d'adresses. Quelqu'un peut-il m'expliquer comment résoudre ce problème ?

Je vous prie d'agréer, Madame, Monsieur, l'expression de mes salutations distinguées, Walter wcochuyt@skynet.be vertaald met DeepL
creator: wcochuyt

title: Detaching attachments in Thunderbird & impact in gmail
content:
What happens to attachments in gmail emails when they are detached from emails in Thunderbird?

I'm trying to save space in my cloud storage so have been detaching large attachments from emails in Thunderbird.

It seems though, that when I look at gmail, the attachments are still part of the email.

What is meant to happen to the original gmail emails?

Is there a 'detach' function in gmail?

Thanks

Simon

title: čeština/ jiný jazyk než angličtina
content:
Po instalaci Thbirdu jsem stáhl plug in s češtinou a v nastavení zrušil "jazyk" angličtina, od té chvíle mi běží oprava pravopisu v češtině, ale při psaní zprávy je celý český text podtržený - zjevně podle anglického pravopisu a je to otravné. Přípdné chyby se těžko hledají. V nastavení chybí tlačítko, které je v modzille - "Jazyk", které by tak nejak "natvrdo" nastavilo používání češtiny všude. Připadá mi, že v předchozí verzi, kterou jsem používal na předešlém NTB bylo vše bez problému. Na tomto "zánovním" NTB a vyšší verzi mne to nepříjemně překvapuje.

Přesto děkuji za existenci této skupiny a za to, že vytváří a umožňuje používání této skvělé aplikace zdarma.

J
creator: jan2bederka

title: [RISOLTO] Problema importazione email backup
content:
Ciao a tutti,

di recente ho migrato il mio sito su un nuovo server e, prima della migrazione, ho eseguito un backup del profilo di Thunderbird (utilizzo 3 account di posta).

Dopo la migrazione ho ricreato le caselle email e riconfigurato Thunderbird aggiornando le porte dei server e le password. Il client si riavvia e scarica regolarmente la posta senza problemi.

Il problema sorge quando provo a importare le email dal backup: viene creata una cartella locale chiamata "Import Thunderbird", ma al suo interno non compare nulla.

Per verificare se il backup fosse corrotto, ho provato a importare l’intero profilo salvato e in questo caso l’operazione riesce. Tuttavia, non posso mantenerlo perché contiene le vecchie configurazioni. Appena aggiorno le impostazioni con quelle nuove, Thunderbird si riavvia e le vecchie email scompaiono.

Ho utilizzato sia l'estensione ImportExportTools NG per il backup dell’intero profilo, sia l’esportazione nativa di Thunderbird, seguendo la procedura indicata qui:

https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/importa-impostazioni-dati-Thunderbird

Qualcuno ha suggerimenti su come recuperare le vecchie email senza perdere le nuove configurazioni?

Grazie in anticipo!


---> non avevo visto questa guida che altri volontari hanno suggerito: https://radiofaro.neocities.org/kb/index/002

ho risolto grazie a questa. Grazi!
creator: rento1
